virtual GISGEOM_API GisICurveString* GisGeometryFactoryAbstract::CreateCurveString (  GisCurveSegmentCollection *  curveSegments  )  [pure virtual]
 

CurveString Creates a CurveString object by copying from a collection of CurveSegment objects.

Parameters:
curveSegments Input collection of CurveSegment objects to copy
Returns:
Returns a CurveString

Implemented in GisAgfGeometryFactory.
